sentences.sContent: Her grandmother lent her a camera for a school trip to Venice and Egypt.
sentences.sCn: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

sentences.sContent: ...The researchers set out six camera traps...

...You must have left the camera in the market...
...It’s a very expensive camera you know...
...Kodak invented the first digital camera in 1975 - but in a fateful decision...
...You know any picture of a person who poses for the camera would look dull and unnatural...
